pullRequest.title: Cleaning up code in GMTools and RAT Management files
pullRequest.bodyText: This originated in me looking for the issue for #1302, but is only a code cleanup. It does not fix the aforementioned issue, which is likely in MegeMek instead of MekHQ

nodes.bodyText: The second null check is here because performRollRat() can return null.
